entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle mixed with rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle mixed with rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle mixed with rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle mixed with rain changing to rain at times heavy overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Clearing late in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 70 gusting to 90 in the morning then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023
